scripts.build: echo BUILD_MARKER_2026_02_27_v5 && cd ../frontend && npm_config_legacy_peer_deps=true npm i --no-save @rollup/rollup-linux-x64-gnu && node -e "require('@rollup/rollup-linux-x64-gnu'); console.log('ROLLUP_NATIVE_OK')" && bun install && bunx vite build --outDir=../backend/frontend/dist
